cities.header: The whole city becomes a stage

joinCommunity.header: Become a part of our world!
joinCommunity.text: Together we create a space where <1>{{talent}}</1>, <2>{{dream}}</2> and <3>{{energy}}</3> can come together, making the city more vibrant and inspiring.

buskerJoin.text: Whether you are an artist or a fan of street art, our platform is for you. Join us and let's create unforgettable experiences together!

tryApp.text: Have you tried our app yet? If not, what are you waiting for!
